;north

;Note, with following two sets of code, a slight minor issue exists
;with the neighbouring avenue tile when its intersected with 
;networks & these exist in-game. would require substantial amount of additional overrides &/or INI entries
;avenue curved, orthogonal lightrail 1a
;TYPE0=0x00020401,0x02000200,0x5F872900,0,0
;TYPE1=0x02040100,0x00020002,0x5F872900,1,0
;TYPE2=0x04010002,0x02000200,0x5F872900,2,0
;TYPE3=0x01000204,0x00020002,0x5F872900,3,0
;TYPE4=0x00030402,0x02000200,0x5F872900,0,1
;TYPE5=0x03040200,0x00020002,0x5F872900,3,1
;TYPE6=0x04020003,0x02000200,0x5F872900,2,1
;TYPE7=0x02000304,0x00020002,0x5F872900,1,1
;avenue curved, orthogonal lightrail 1b
;TYPE0=0x04020001,0x02000200,0x5F872940,0,0
;TYPE1=0x02000104,0x00020002,0x5F872940,1,0
;TYPE2=0x00010402,0x02000200,0x5F872940,2,0
;TYPE3=0x01040200,0x00020002,0x5F872940,3,0
;TYPE4=0x04030002,0x02000200,0x5F872940,0,1
;TYPE5=0x03000204,0x00020002,0x5F872940,3,1
;TYPE6=0x00020403,0x02000200,0x5F872940,2,1
;TYPE7=0x02040300,0x00020002,0x5F872940,1,1

;orthogonal avenue corner x orthogonal lightrail
;TYPE4=0x04040000,0x02000200,0x12345678,0,0 ;code line is not recognised
;TYPE4=0x02040400,0x00000200,0x12345678,0,0
;
;
;
;Added 040508 ~ memo
;Avenue intersection with lightrail, needed for GLRAvenue Roundabout
TYPE0=0x04020204,0x02000200,0x5F479800,0,0
TYPE1=0x02020404,0x00020002,0x5F479800,1,0
TYPE2=0x02040402,0x02000200,0x5F479800,2,0
